title: Fleur de Lyz
content:
I’m not sure this is the right place to ask, so if it’s not please excuse me.

I’m looking for different designs of the Fleur de Lyz.

Any help is welcome: typefaces, vectorial images.

 [‹ Font Suggestion: Replacement for Serifa](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120071303/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32955 "Go to previous forum topic") [Don't want to use Arial or Times New Roman ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081120071303/http:/www.typophile.com/node/32940 "Go to next forum topic")
author: souljacker

comments.content:
It would help your search if you spelled it “fleur de lys” or “fleur de lis”.

hhp
